HELPEMBED_footer: Use '{0}help <command>' for more info on a command.
HELP_help: Show the help message, or more details on a specific command.
HELP_quote: Quote a message using a message ID or link.
HELP_clone: Clone up to 50 messages from one channel to another using a webhook.
HELP_personalset: Set a Personal Quote that you can quote in any mutual server.
HELP_personalcopy: Copy a Personal/Server Quote so you can use it yourself.
HELP_personalclear: Remove all of your Personal Quotes.
HELP_serverset: Set a Server Quote that can be quoted in this server.
HELP_servercopy: Copy a Personal/Server Quote so it can be quoted in this server.
HELP_toggledelete: Toggle deleting quote command messages in the server. Requires the 'Manage Server' permission.
HELP_togglelinks: Toggle quoting linked messages in the server. Requires the 'Manage Server' permission.
HELP_togglereaction: Toggle quoting by adding :speech_balloon: reactions to messages in the server. Requires the 'Manage Server' permission.
HELP_setprefix: Set the command prefix for the server. Requires the 'Manage Server' permission.
HELP_setlanguage: Set the language for the server. Requires the 'Manage Server' permission.
HELP_snipe: Snipe the last deleted message from a specified channel or the current channel.
HELP_snipeedit: Snipe the last edited message from a specified channel or the current channel.
HELP_highlight: Highlight a query of up to 50 characters so every message in a mutual server channel containing it will be quoted to you. Requires allowing direct messages from server members in your 'Privacy & Safety' settings.
MAIN_quote_noperms: **I don't have permissions to fetch messages from that channel.**
MAIN_quote_inputerror: **Please specify a valid message ID or URL.**
MAIN_quote_rawembed: Raw embed quoted by @​{0} from @​{1} in {2}
MAIN_link_rawembed: Raw embed linked by @​{0} from @​{1} in {2}
MAIN_personal_rawembed: Raw embed (Personal Quote) by @​{0} from @​{1} in {2}
MAIN_server_rawembed: Raw embed (Server Quote) by @​{0} from @​{1} in {2}
MAIN_snipe_rawembed: Raw embed sniped by @​{0} from @​{1} in {2}
PERSONAL_serverlist_noquotes: **This server doesn't have any Server Quotes.**
HIGHLIGHTS_highlight_toolong: **Highlight query cannot be longer than 50 characters.**
HIGHLIGHTS_highlight_dmsdisabled: **Allow direct messages from server members in your 'Privacy & Safety' settings to make use of Highlights.**
META_command_oncooldown: **Command on cooldown. Try again in {0} s.**
META_command_noprivatemsg: **This command can only be used in servers.**
META_command_noperms: **You don't have permission to use this command.**
META_command_inputerror: **Invalid command input. Use `{0}` for command usage info.**
